The court noted the police's allegations of illegal entry and forged documents, along with digital evidence linking him to Bangladesh. The investigation is ongoing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/aadhaar-pan-voter-id-alone-not-enough-proof-of-citizenship-bombay-high-court/articleshow/123267141.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/aadhaar-pan-voter-id-alone-not-enough-proof-of-citizenship-bombay-high-court/articleshow/123267141.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 03:52:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ROSY SEQUEIRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="92006" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123267161,imgsize-92006.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi likely to visit US: UNGA address on cards; trip amid Trump tariff row</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi is slated to meet US President Donald Trump in New York during the UN General Assembly next month. This occurs amidst rising tensions as Washington increased tariffs on New Delhi for purchasing Russian crude oil. Trump will also meet with Vladimir Putin in Alaska on August 15 to discuss ending the war in Ukraine.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-modi-likely-to-visit-new-york-unga-address-on-cards-trip-amid-trump-tariff-row/articleshow/123269389.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-modi-likely-to-visit-new-york-unga-address-on-cards-trip-amid-trump-tariff-row/articleshow/123269389.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:03:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="69294" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270267,imgsize-69294.cms"/></item><item><title>DRDO guest house manager arrested for spying; passed secrets to Pakistan’s ISI</title><description><![CDATA[Mahendra Singh, manager of a DRDO guest house in Jaisalmer, has been arrested by Rajasthan Police for allegedly spying for Pakistan's ISI. After being detained and jointly interrogated, evidence emerged confirming his involvement in passing sensitive information about DRDO scientists, army officers' visits, and missile testing at the Chandan Field Firing Range.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/spy-drdo-guest-house-manager-held/articleshow/123266302.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/spy-drdo-guest-house-manager-held/articleshow/123266302.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 01:07:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="422463" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269956,imgsize-422463.cms"/></item><item><title>'Babar should never have been compared to Kohli' – Former Pakistan cricketer</title><description><![CDATA[Ahmed Shehzad has criticized the comparisons between Babar Azam and Virat Kohli, stating they create undue pressure affecting Babar's performance. Shehzad emphasized Kohli's legendary status, unmatched even by MS Dhoni as a batter and athlete. Babar has now gone 72 consecutive international innings without scoring a century, with his last hundred coming against Nepal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wi-vs-pak-babar-azam-should-never-have-been-compared-to-virat-kohli-former-pakistan-cricketer/articleshow/123270734.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wi-vs-pak-babar-azam-should-never-have-been-compared-to-virat-kohli-former-pakistan-cricketer/articleshow/123270734.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 09:11:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1288384" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270848,imgsize-1288384.cms"/></item><item><title>Stock market today: Nifty opens in green; Sensex up over 270 points</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Wednesday. While Nifty50 was above 24,550, BSE Sensex was up over 250 points. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/stock-market-today-nifty50-bse-sensex-august-13-2025-dalal-street-indian-equities-global-markets-donald-trump-tariffs/articleshow/123270915.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/stock-market-today-nifty50-bse-sensex-august-13-2025-dalal-street-indian-equities-global-markets-donald-trump-tariffs/articleshow/123270915.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 09:22:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="104856" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123271022,imgsize-104856.cms"/></item><item><title>H-1B overhaul: Trump to end visa lottery; what new immigration policy means for applicants</title><description><![CDATA[The White House has approved a proposed rule to potentially overhaul the H-1B visa program, shifting from a lottery system to prioritizing applicants based on wages. This revives a Trump-era initiative aimed at favoring higher-skilled, higher-paid foreign workers. While supporters claim it protects American jobs, critics argue it could limit opportunities for entry-level professionals and recent graduates.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/donald-trumps-new-immigration-policy-to-end-h-1b-visa-lottery-heres-what-it-means/articleshow/123266589.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/donald-trumps-new-immigration-policy-to-end-h-1b-visa-lottery-heres-what-it-means/articleshow/123266589.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 02:00:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123266587,imgsize-32658.cms"/></item><item><title>Women's World Cup: Thiruvananthapuram set to step in for 'unsafe' Bengaluru</title><description><![CDATA[Thiruvananthapuram's Greenfield Stadium may host Women's World Cup matches after Bengaluru's Chinnaswamy Stadium lost hosting rights. Following a tragic stampede and subsequent safety concerns, the Karnataka government withdrew permission. ICC Chairman Jay Shah inquired about Thiruvananthapuram's readiness, and the KCA president confirmed their preparedness. While awaiting official confirmation from the ICC, logistical challenges are being addressed for the potential matches.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/womens-world-cup-thiruvananthapuram-set-to-step-in-after-chinnaswamy-stadium-declared-unsafe/articleshow/123270572.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/womens-world-cup-thiruvananthapuram-set-to-step-in-after-chinnaswamy-stadium-declared-unsafe/articleshow/123270572.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:59:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>VISHAL MENON</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="56124" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270677,imgsize-56124.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: 'Indian jawaan ghar wapas nahi aate, aur hum cricket khelne Pak jaate hain'</title><description><![CDATA[Harbhajan Singh has strongly advocated for India to boycott Pakistan matches in the upcoming Asia Cup, echoing the sentiment of 'nation first.' He highlights the sacrifices of soldiers on the border and questions the importance given to Pakistan by the media. Harbhajan was part of the India Champions team that refused to play Pakistan in the WCL.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup-humare-jawaan-ghar-wapas-nahi-aate-aur-hum-cricket-khelne-chale-jaate-hain/articleshow/123268855.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup-humare-jawaan-ghar-wapas-nahi-aate-aur-hum-cricket-khelne-chale-jaate-hain/articleshow/123268855.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 06:21:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT KUMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1338732" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123268914,imgsize-1338732.cms"/></item><item><title>UP horror: Deaf-mute woman gangraped in Balrampur</title><description><![CDATA[Balrampur police arrested Ankur Verma and Harshit Pandey for the gangrape of a 22-year-old deaf-mute woman. The arrest happened after an encounter. The victim was attacked on August 11. CCTV footage showed the victim fleeing. The suspects were trying to escape to Nepal. They opened fire on police. Both confessed to the crime. Police are investigating further.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/uttar-pradesh-horror-deaf-mute-woman-gangraped-in-balrampur-2-arrested-after-early-morning-encounter/articleshow/123270163.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/uttar-pradesh-horror-deaf-mute-woman-gangraped-in-balrampur-2-arrested-after-early-morning-encounter/articleshow/123270163.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:20:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PATHIKRIT CHAKRABORTY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1530244" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270186,imgsize-1530244.cms"/></item><item><title>Why neighbours are 'concerned' with Mark Zuckerberg buying houses in Palo Alto</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Zuckerberg's real estate acquisitions in Palo Alto's Crescent Park, totaling over $110 million, have sparked concerns among neighbors. Extensive renovations, including subterranean spaces, have disrupted the neighborhood's peace. Residents feel the community's spirit has diminished due to the billionaire's presence and perceived disregard for local norms, leading to accusations of exploiting loopholes in zoning laws.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/why-neighbours-are-concerned-with-mark-zuckerberg-buying-houses-in-palo-alto-the-place-that-has-been-house-to-steve-jobs-and-other-tech-execs/articleshow/123239502.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/why-neighbours-are-concerned-with-mark-zuckerberg-buying-houses-in-palo-alto-the-place-that-has-been-house-to-steve-jobs-and-other-tech-execs/articleshow/123239502.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 20:10:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123239494,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>Rajasthan road tragedy: 11 dead in Dausa crash; nine injured hospitalised</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic road accident on the Dausa–Manoharpur Highway claimed the lives of 11 individuals, including women and children, early Wednesday. The victims were returning from Khatu Shyam temple when their pick-up van collided with a container truck. Several others sustained injuries, with some being transferred to SMS Hospital in Jaipur for advanced medical care.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/rajasthan-accident-10-dead-several-injured-in-pick-up-vehicletrailer-truck-crash/articleshow/123269709.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/rajasthan-accident-10-dead-several-injured-in-pick-up-vehicletrailer-truck-crash/articleshow/123269709.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 07:30:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24936" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269850,imgsize-24936.cms"/></item><item><title>Constitutional Club election: Rajiv Pratap Rudy wins tight BJP vs BJP contest</title><description><![CDATA[Rajiv Pratap Rudy secured another term as head of the Constitution Club, defeating Sanjeev Balyan in a high-profile election that saw significant participation from across the political spectrum, including Amit Shah and Sonia Gandhi. Rudy, celebrating his victory, emphasized the collective effort behind his win and the endorsement from parliamentarians.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/constitutional-club-election-rajiv-pratap-rudy-wins-tight-bjp-vs-bjp-contest-heavyweights-like-amit-shah-sonia-gandhi-vote/articleshow/123269799.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/constitutional-club-election-rajiv-pratap-rudy-wins-tight-bjp-vs-bjp-contest-heavyweights-like-amit-shah-sonia-gandhi-vote/articleshow/123269799.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 07:38:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="939565" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269804,imgsize-939565.cms"/></item><item><title>WATCH: Shocking! Corbin Bosch in disbelief as ball hit stumps but bails stay put</title><description><![CDATA[During the second T20I match between Australia and South Africa, Corbin Bosch's delivery hit Mitchell Owen’s stumps, but the bail miraculously remained in place. Despite the bizarre incident, South Africa secured a 53-run victory, leveling the series 1-1. Dewald Brevis shone with an unbeaten 125, leading South Africa to a formidable total.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-shocking-corbin-bosch-in-disbelief-as-ball-hit-stumps-but-bails-stay-put/articleshow/123270534.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-shocking-corbin-bosch-in-disbelief-as-ball-hit-stumps-but-bails-stay-put/articleshow/123270534.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 09:09:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57574" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270656,imgsize-57574.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI may have just fired a 'warning shot' at Indian IT companies' revenue model</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI's GPT-5 launch poses a threat to India's IT sector, potentially causing a 2-3% revenue decline due to enhanced AI coding capabilities. While AI improves productivity and shifts billing models, firms face challenges adapting to outcome-based pricing. Experts predict short-term pain but long-term gains as new AI opportunities emerge, requiring IT firms to overhaul delivery models.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-may-have-just-fired-a-warning-shot-at-indian-it-companies-revenue-model-says-analyst-note-but-theres-also-/articleshow/123256526.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-may-have-just-fired-a-warning-shot-at-indian-it-companies-revenue-model-says-analyst-note-but-theres-also-/articleshow/123256526.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:47:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="480076" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256517,imgsize-480076.cms"/></item><item><title>Honour killing: Gujarat family kills Neet aspirant; partner’s plea exposes murder</title><description><![CDATA[Chandrika Chaudhary, an 18-year-old aspiring doctor from Banaskantha, was allegedly murdered by her uncle for pursuing her dreams. Her family feared she would fall in love and marry by choice, bringing "dishonour" to them. The uncle allegedly drugged and strangled her, staging it as a suicide, but a habeas corpus petition filed by her partner exposed the crime.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/family-feared-dishonour-if-18-year-old-chandhrika-went-to-medical-college/articleshow/123264013.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/family-feared-dishonour-if-18-year-old-chandhrika-went-to-medical-college/articleshow/123264013.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 23:16:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ASHISH CHAUHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269506,imgsize-21382.cms"/></item><item><title>New wage-based H-1B rule: Entry-level international students at a serious disadvantage</title><description><![CDATA[The US government's potential shift to a wage-based H-1B visa system is creating uncertainty for international students. Prioritizing higher salaries could disadvantage entry-level graduates, particularly in non-STEM fields, limiting their career prospects in the US. Universities and students are adapting by exploring alternative visa options and enhancing skills to navigate this evolving landscape.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/new-wage-based-h-1b-rule-may-put-entry-level-international-students-at-a-serious-disadvantage-heres-how/articleshow/123269835.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/new-wage-based-h-1b-rule-may-put-entry-level-international-students-at-a-serious-disadvantage-heres-how/articleshow/123269835.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 07:46:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>LAKSHIMA SAREEN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="170235" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269873,imgsize-170235.cms"/></item><item><title>'Saiyaara' box office: Film mints over Rs 321 cr; outperforms ‘Son of Sardaar 2’,‘Dhadak 2’</title><description><![CDATA[Mohit Suri's directorial 'Saiyaara,' starring debutants Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, has maintained a strong box office presence, crossing ₹320 crore domestically after a 26-day run. Despite new releases, the romantic drama outperformed 'Son of Sardaar 2' and 'Dhadak 2'. 'Saiyaara' earned ₹1.50 crore on Tuesday, surpassing 'Son of Sardaar 2's ₹1.15 crore.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-26-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-mints-over-rs-321-crore-outperforms-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2-on-tuesday/articleshow/123268631.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-26-ahaan-panday-and-aneet-padda-starrer-mints-over-rs-321-crore-outperforms-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2-on-tuesday/articleshow/123268631.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 05:59:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="150560" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123268647,imgsize-150560.cms"/></item><item><title>Illegal betting: Racket, laundering allegations; Suresh Raina under ED investigation</title><description><![CDATA[Cricketer Suresh Raina is set to be questioned by the Enforcement Directorate (ED) on Wednesday regarding a money laundering case linked to illegal online betting, specifically involving 1XBet. This action follows a previous ED crackdown on illegal betting related to IPL matches, where assets worth ₹337 crore were seized last year. The ED had also attached assets worth ₹219.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/illegal-online-betting-suresh-raina-summoned-by-ed-in-money-laundering-probe/articleshow/123270369.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/illegal-online-betting-suresh-raina-summoned-by-ed-in-money-laundering-probe/articleshow/123270369.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:29:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1124633" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270404,imgsize-1124633.cms"/></item><item><title>Kaun Banega Crorepati 17: Amitabh Bachchan hails India's recent victory against England at the Oval test; says 'Abhi joh maara hai na hum ne angrezon ko mazaa aagaya yaar...'</title><description><![CDATA[Amitabh Bachchan reminisced about KBC's early days as the show continued with Ashutosh Kumar Pandey, who eventually won Rs 5,00,000. Vijay Anand then took the hot seat, sharing an emotional story about treating his parents to their first restaurant meal. Vijay's impressive gameplay led him to win Rs 12,50,000 after answering several questions correctly and utilizing his lifelines strategically.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/kaun-banega-crorepati-17-amitabh-bachchan-hails-indias-recent-victory-against-england-at-the-oval-test-says-abhi-joh-maara-hai-na-hum-ne-angrezon-ko-mazaa-aagaya-yaar-/articleshow/123270863.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/kaun-banega-crorepati-17-amitabh-bachchan-hails-indias-recent-victory-against-england-at-the-oval-test-says-abhi-joh-maara-hai-na-hum-ne-angrezon-ko-mazaa-aagaya-yaar-/articleshow/123270863.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 09:14:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>etimes.in</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55390" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270855,imgsize-55390.cms"/></item><item><title>Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for August 13 - check list</title><description><![CDATA[Stock market recommendations: Anand Rathi Shares and Stock Brokers' Mehul Kothari suggests Intellect Design, Diffusion Engineers, and Sumitomo Chemical as top stock picks. Intellect Design presents an attractive risk-reward after retracing 50% and approaching oversold RSI. Diffusion Engineers shows a potential momentum shift after a consolidation phase, while Sumitomo Chemical offers a breakout retest opportunity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-august-13-2025-intellect-design-diffusion-engineers-sumitomo-chemical-best-stocks-to-buy-today/articleshow/123257012.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-august-13-2025-intellect-design-diffusion-engineers-sumitomo-chemical-best-stocks-to-buy-today/articleshow/123257012.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 07:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123257069,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>UK asks people to 'delete' old emails to save water</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/uk-asks-people-to-delete-old-emails-to-save-water-drought-situation-nationally-significant/articleshow/123266577.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/uk/uk-asks-people-to-delete-old-emails-to-save-water-drought-situation-nationally-significant/articleshow/123266577.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 01:58:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="153484" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123266584,imgsize-153484.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Ties with India, Pak unchanged’: US 'committed to both nations'; again take credit for ceasefire</title><description><![CDATA[The US State Department says its relationship with Pakistan and India remains unchanged. This statement follows Pakistan army general Asim Munir's nuclear threats to India. Tammy Bruce took credit for brokering a ceasefire between India and Pakistan. She also mentioned the US-Pakistan counter-terrorism dialogue in Islamabad. She said that US and Pakistan discussed ways to enhance cooperation to counter terrorist threats.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ties-with-india-pakistan-unchanged-us-committed-to-both-nations-again-take-credit-for-ceasefire/articleshow/123269338.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/ties-with-india-pakistan-unchanged-us-committed-to-both-nations-again-take-credit-for-ceasefire/articleshow/123269338.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 06:54:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25132" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269715,imgsize-25132.cms"/></item><item><title>Man killed by childhood friend over extramarital affair in Bengaluru</title><description><![CDATA[In a shocking incident in Bengaluru's Machohalli, Vijay Kumar was murdered, allegedly by his wife's lover, Dhananjay. Police have detained Asha, Vijay's wife, Dhananjay, and others for questioning. The attackers fatally assaulted Vijay with machetes near his residence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/lovers-plot-murder-to-keep-affair-alive-man-killed-by-childhood-friend-in-bengaluru-wife-lover-detained/articleshow/123269906.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/lovers-plot-murder-to-keep-affair-alive-man-killed-by-childhood-friend-in-bengaluru-wife-lover-detained/articleshow/123269906.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:08:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>H M CHAITHANYA SWAMY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269986,imgsize-24662.cms"/></item><item><title>No coercive action against overage vehicles: Supreme Court</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has provided relief to vehicle owners in Delhi by directing a halt to coercive actions against overage vehicles.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-coercive-action-against-overage-vehicles-supreme-court/articleshow/123268236.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-coercive-action-against-overage-vehicles-supreme-court/articleshow/123268236.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 05:26:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT ANAND CHOUDHARY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1382516" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123268269,imgsize-1382516.cms"/></item><item><title>U'khand halts constructions in 'disaster-prone' zones</title><description><![CDATA[Following the Dharali disaster, Uttarakhand has halted construction in disaster-prone zones. Authorities have launched an investigation, confirming no injuries and the resumption of normal airport operations, with no ongoing threat to the public.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/airport-chaos-police-gun-discharges-at-sydney-airport-probe-underway/articleshow/123268376.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/airport-chaos-police-gun-discharges-at-sydney-airport-probe-underway/articleshow/123268376.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 05:41:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="436330" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123268419,imgsize-436330.cms"/></item><item><title>WI vs PAK: Pakistan hammered in 202-run loss in ODI series decider! Pakistan's batting collapsed, resulting in a significant loss.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wi-vs-pak-pakistan-hammered-in-202-run-loss-in-odi-series-decider-what-are-their-biggest-defeats-in-the-format/articleshow/123269993.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wi-vs-pak-pakistan-hammered-in-202-run-loss-in-odi-series-decider-what-are-their-biggest-defeats-in-the-format/articleshow/123269993.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:09:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="90442" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270054,imgsize-90442.cms"/></item><item><title>Zelenskyy sidelined from upcoming Russia-US talks - Here's why</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump will meet Vladimir Putin to discuss ending the Ukraine war. European allies support Ukraine's stance. Trump will share the meeting's outcome with Zelenskyy and European leaders. The meeting will be held in Alaska.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/russia-us-peace-talks-zelenskyy-has-been-sidelined-from-the-upcoming-meeting-heres-why/articleshow/123266639.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/russia-us-peace-talks-zelenskyy-has-been-sidelined-from-the-upcoming-meeting-heres-why/articleshow/123266639.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 02:43:36 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1043678" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123266660,imgsize-1043678.cms"/></item><item><title>England cricketer blocked from promoting OnlyFans in The Hundred</title><description><![CDATA[Tymal Mills, the England fast bowler, was prohibited by the ECB from displaying his OnlyFans logo on his bat during The Hundred in August 2025. This action follows LG Manoj Sinha's commitment to reinvestigate terror killings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/raids-at-jklf-chiefs-home-over-1990-murder-of-pandit-woman/articleshow/123265228.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/raids-at-jklf-chiefs-home-over-1990-murder-of-pandit-woman/articleshow/123265228.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 00:03:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NASEER GANAI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="956390" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123265224,imgsize-956390.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Was like Nirbhaya case’: Man gets life forraping 11yo Dalit girl, burning private parts</title><description><![CDATA[A Rampur court sentenced Dan Singh Yadav, 26, to rigorous life imprisonment for the brutal rape and torture of an 11-year-old hearing and speech-impaired Dalit girl in April 2025. The survivor suffered severe internal injuries, including burns inflicted with cigarettes, requiring multiple surgeries. Yadav was apprehended after evidence including CCTV footage and forensic findings linked him to the crime.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bareilly/was-like-nirbhaya-case-man-gets-life-forraping-11yo-dalit-girl-burning-private-parts/articleshow/123261278.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bareilly/was-like-nirbhaya-case-man-gets-life-forraping-11yo-dalit-girl-burning-private-parts/articleshow/123261278.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 20:33:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>KANWARDEEP SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="650693" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270515,imgsize-650693.cms"/></item><item><title>Man beaten to death after he claims he ‘killed’ child, police say kid’s killer was held in 2019</title><description><![CDATA[In Chhattisgarh's Sakti district, a 45-year-old man, Surve Das Mahant, was beaten to death after drunkenly claiming responsibility for a 2019 murder for which a juvenile had already been convicted. Enraged villagers stripped and assaulted Mahant, who had a history of petty crime, after he argued with relatives and confessed to killing their child.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/man-beaten-to-death-after-he-claims-he-killed-child-police-say-kids-killer-was-held-in-2019/articleshow/123266036.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/man-beaten-to-death-after-he-claims-he-killed-child-police-say-kids-killer-was-held-in-2019/articleshow/123266036.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 00:42:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25120" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270630,imgsize-25120.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Tue, 12 Aug 2025 21:36:57 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/08/startup_funding1.jpg"/>
    </item>
